headline: WATCH: Dr. Oz responds to Bidens request that he resign from fitness council
author: Heather Hamilton
sentences: Famous TV doctor-turned-Republican Senate candidate Dr. Mehmet Oz responded to President Joe Biden's request that he resign from the Presidents Council on Sports, Fitness, and Nutrition Wednesday, adding that the president should instead seek another doctors resignation.

A White House official told CNN Wednesday that Oz, along with fellow council member and Republican Senate candidate Herschel Walker, were in violation of the Biden administration's policy of federal candidates serving on presidential boards.
I would think record-high energy prices, a 40-year high with inflation, and a tragedy with Ukraine would be a more important priority, Oz added.
Biden sent both candidates a letter that gave them the option to resign  and if they didn't, the president said they would be terminated.
The doctor he should ask to resign is Dr. Anthony Fauci for a multitude of obvious reasons, Oz said in a video message.
Its beyond sad that President Biden would politicize such an important issue like health, Oz stated.
Oz suggested Biden focus on other, more pressing concerns facing the public.
With that said, Ive got no intention, my friends, of resigning  none.
If President Biden wants to politicize health, hell have to fire me.
Let Americans see how truly petty and political he truly is.
